plugins.name: Export Frame 2 Json
plugins.description:
A plugin to customize the information of the elements in the Frame export json file .


一个将Frame里的元素信息自定义导出json文件的插件。


可以将模版内的结构梳理成 background 背景层、foreground 前景层 和 medias 媒体资源（用户替换图片的层）。

Tips: 在交付版本中，模版内的元素（包括文字）都可以转换成图片，避免出现旋转缩放等参数，这样更好定位元素大小和位置。

图层命名前缀可以用模版名称，后缀命名规则如下：

  1. 背景层用「bg」
  2. 媒体资源用「mask」
  3. 前景素材用「sticker」（文字目前暂时转成图片用sticker命名）
  4. 同类型用序号区分。

导出的内容统一使用.png格式即可。
plugins.tagline: A plugin to customize the information of the elements in the Frame export json file .

114673.description:

可以将模版内的结构梳理成 background 背景层、foreground 前景层 和 medias 媒体资源（用户替换图片的层）。

Tips: 在交付版本中，模版内的元素（包括文字）都可以转换成图片，避免出现旋转缩放等参数，这样更好定位元素大小和位置。

  2. 媒体资源用「mask」
  3. 前景素材用「sticker」（文字目前暂时转成图片用sticker命名）
  4. 同类型用序号区分。

导出的内容统一使用.png格式即可。
114673.tagline: A plugin to customize the information of the elements in the Frame export json file .

plugins.name: Sri lankan Name Generator
plugins.description: This plugin allows users to generate unique Sri Lankan names based on gender and ethnicity. It's ideal for creating culturally relevant and diverse placeholder names for mockups, wireframes, or design projects. Users can select from Sinhala, Tamil, Muslim, or Burgher names for both genders, ensuring inclusivity and variety in your designs. Easily apply names to text layers with just a few clicks!
plugins.tagline: Generate authentic Sri Lankan names by gender and ethnicity for your designs and projects.

120719.name: Sri lankan Name Generator
120719.description: This plugin allows users to generate unique Sri Lankan names based on gender and ethnicity. 🔄 Fixed Scrolling Issues: The plugin height is now fixed with no unwanted scrolling.

plugins.name: 角落艺术家
plugins.description:
In the new version of "Corner Artist," I've added a language switch feature between Chinese and English. Here, you can freely switch to your preferred language as needed.


The new version optimizes the user experience, making the overall UI more refined and convenient.


By clicking the button, you can randomly switch to your favorite gradient colors.

Additionally, the new version introduces a "Random Corner Radius" feature, allowing you to choose the layer you want to modify and adjust the corner radius strength.


Here, the higher the value, the smaller the corner radius strength.


I’ve used the superellipse corner radius formula:

|x/a|^n + |y/b|^n = 1

When n = 2, it’s a regular ellipse;

When n < 2, it’s a superellipse;

The smaller the value of n, the closer the corners are to right angles.


For those interested, you can explore the formula on your own; I’ll post it in the comments.

When you choose a corner radius strength less than 1, you'll also receive stars as a bonus.


That's about it for the new features. Feel free to experience and save them!
plugins.tagline: Making the overall UI more refined and convenient.

113419.name: 角落艺术家

plugins.name: Find Word Duplicates Ninja
plugins.description:
Find Word Duplicate Ninja is your reliable assistant for quickly spotting and managing duplicate words within your designs.


Key Features:


Duplicate Word Detection:

Instantly find duplicate words across all text layers.


Automatic Highlighting:

Automatically highlights all occurrences of duplicate words for easy identification.


Customizable Settings:

Adjust minimum word length to match your specific project needs.


Seamless Navigation:

Click a duplicate word tag to navigate directly to all its occurrences within your design.


Intuitive User Interface:

Stylish, user-friendly interface with well-designed tags for optimal usability.


Performance Optimized:

Efficiently handles large files without slowing down Figma's performance.


Why Choose Find Word Duplicate Ninja?


Boost Productivity:

Quickly catch duplicate words, save time, and streamline your workflow.


Improve Consistency:

Ensure consistent text throughout your project without any overlooked duplications.


Easy to Use:

Intuitive and straightforward interface suitable for designers of all levels.

accepted.name: BrandNinjas
accepted.description: UI/UX designer crafting Figma plugins for creatives and efficiency seekers.

plugins.tagline: Quickly identify and highlight duplicate words in your designs.

plugins.name: Swift Layer Exporter
plugins.description:
Manage the layers you want to export based on their name. Just add the file type extension (.jpg, .png, .svg, .pdf) to any layer. With the plugin open select any layer or any parent and all of the tagged layers will automatically be found to export.


You can also set the export scale by adding a percent 200% after the extension. You can also set the layer cropping to its native bounding box with the tag = or to the base frame with #.


  1. button.png # 200% - exports the layer button as a png at 200% in the size of the layout base frame.
  2. button.svg = 100% - exports the layer button as a svg at 100% in the size of the layer.
plugins.tagline: Manage export layers by name

124254.name: Swift Layer Exporter
124254.description:
Manage the layers you want to export based on their name. Just add the file type extension (.jpg, .png, .svg, .pdf) to any layer. With the plugin open select any layer or any parent and all of the tagged layers will automatically be found to export.


You can also set the export scale by adding a percent 200% after the extension. You can also set the layer cropping to its native bounding box with the tag = or to the base frame with #.


  1. button.png # 200% - exports the layer button as a png at 200% in the size of the layout base frame.
  2. button.svg = 100% - exports the layer button as a svg at 100% in the size of the layer.

plugins.name: Figma Instance Mode
plugins.description:
Inspired by this post: Please add an "Instance Selection" mode - Share an idea - Figma Community Forum


🔶 Introducing Figma Instance Mode


- ⤴️ Select Instance

- ✅ Instance Mode On

- 🚫 Instance Mode Off


⤴️ Select Instance


check if there is a parent or ancestor instance with your selection, and then will redirect your selection to the instance


It is the same as the official feature named `select instance`, but with this plugin you can blind a hotkey to this feature.


✅ Instance Mode On


Once you run this command, every time when you change your selection in Figma will run the `⤴️ Select Instance` command automatically which means you will always select the instance if your selection is within a instance.


And there will be a inspect window to show the program running result, you can get information with it.


🚫 Instance Mode Off


This feature is to turn off the instance mode, and close the inspect window


🔶 How to add GLOBAL SHORTCUT in MacOS


Check the tutorial: Custom-shortcuts-in-figma by Jussi Virtanen


MacOS Global Shortcut Path:


Plugins->Saved plugins->Figma Instance Mode->⤴️ Select Instance


Plugins->Saved plugins->Figma Instance Mode->✅ Instance Mode On


Plugins->Saved plugins->Figma Instance Mode->🚫 Instance Mode Off

accepted.name: RyanHuang 👀
accepted.description:
🔸 Product Designer
🔸 Heavy user of Figma
🔸 Beginner in FE

plugins.tagline: Selecting parent/ancestor instances automatically

plugins.name: Unidup
plugins.description:
Create a design set template that includes component usage and color schemes. With this plugin, you can duplicate your template to a new page, automatically apply new instances of the original component's new variants under consistent layers, and create brand new color schemes.


Additionally, color schemes can be exported in JSON format.



Document Preparation


Document Structure: Prepare the design drafts of the design scheme, which should include "Components Page" and "Template Page", as well as "Color Scheme".


Naming: Each reuse of the design scheme should have a unique name, let's tentatively call it "NAME". This naming is very important as it runs through the entire reuse process.


Template Page: The "Template Page" is the page of your design scheme, and its name should be called NAME. It will play a big role in subsequent work, transforming into various new outputs and serving various new purposes. Therefore, each artboard should contain instances of components for reuse.


Components Page: Each time the design scheme is reused, the output should be unique. The "Components Page" contains unique elements in each set of outputs, and each component should include variants, with the key of the variant being "name" and the value being NAME, to correspond with each set of outputs.


Color Scheme: The naming method for local color schemes in figma is xxx/xxx. When naming, please follow the structure NAME/color1, NAME/color2.



How to Use


Duplicate and Export JSON are two main functions.


Duplicate:

There are three cards in the interface, namely "Components Page", "From Template", and "New Page Naming".


  1. Select your "Components Page", click the "Apply Selected Page" button to the right of "Components Page", and the card will display the details of the "Components Page".
  2. Select your "Template Page", click the "Apply Selected Page" button to the right of "From template", and the card will display the details of the "Template Page".
  3. In the "New Page Naming" card, name your new output.
  4. Click the "Duplicate" button, and you have extended a new output from the "Template Page". Modify the associated components and color scheme, and this output is ready.



Export JSON:

It will list the NAME of all your output schemes, click to export the rgba color values, and download the json to your local.




See usage demo file:

https://www.figma.com/file/jUg3U53QSIzWBEn0RfUdB0/
plugins.tagline: Unidup - An easy way to reuse your design set

plugins.name: Real Content Filler
plugins.description:
Real Data Filler is a quick and smart plugin that populates your Figma text layers with realistic placeholder data — perfect for mockups, UI design, and prototypes.


Choose from a clean, tabbed interface with options like:


Names (full names, first/last)


Emails (realistic domains)


Cities (worldwide)


Phone Numbers


Custom Lists (coming soon)


Each selected text node gets a random data value of the type you select.


Use this to:


Populate wireframes with real-seeming names and emails


Fill mobile/table UI designs with user data


Quickly visualize form states and list views

accepted.name: Open Wave.io
accepted.description: Open Wave is an open-source organization Founded by Lawrence Okosa III. creating tools that streamline design and development workflows.

plugins.tagline: Fill selected text layers with real-looking names, emails, cities, and more

plugins.name: Variable Remapper
plugins.description:
OVERVIEW


The Variable Remapper is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline design system management by enabling seamless migration and remapping of variables between different libraries and collections. This tool is essential for teams managing complex design systems, migrating between libraries, or consolidating variable usage across projects.


CORE CAPABILITIES


Variable Remapping

The plugin provides comprehensive bulk variable migration capabilities, automatically remapping variables from one library to another across entire design systems. The intelligent name matching system matches variables between source and target libraries based on name similarity, reducing manual configuration requirements.

Users can exercise precise scope control by choosing to remap variables across selected objects only, the current page, or all pages in the document. Additionally, collection-specific remapping allows filtering to specific variable collections for granular control over migration processes.


Variable Analysis and Mapping

The system offers comprehensive variable listing functionality to scan and catalog all variable bindings throughout designs. The detailed view presents every variable binding with complete contextual information, including node names and types, bound properties such as fills, strokes, effects, and dimensions, current variable names and sources, plus complete library and collection information.

The grouped view consolidates similar variable bindings for streamlined bulk management operations, while the interactive mapping table enables manual specification of target variables for precise control over remapping processes.


Library Management

The plugin provides robust multi-library support, working seamlessly with local variables in current files, team library variables, and remote libraries. Automatic library detection identifies variable sources and displays comprehensive library information throughout the interface.

Users can browse through variable collections with detailed counts and metadata, supported by real-time loading of library collections and variables for immediate access to current information.


KEY FEATURES


Precision Control

The plugin supports comprehensive property-level binding across all Figma variable binding types, including color variables for fills and strokes, dimension variables for width, height, corner radius, and stroke weight, effect variables for opacity, rotation, and positioning, and boolean variables for visibility controls.

Advanced array property support handles complex bindings such as multiple fills or effects, while safe remapping functionality validates target variables before applying changes to ensure data integrity throughout the migration process.


Advanced Analysis

The binding discovery system automatically identifies all variable bindings across complex node hierarchies, providing complete visibility into variable usage patterns. Source attribution functionality shows exactly where each variable originates, whether from the current file, specific team library names, or remote libraries.

Collection context displays variable collection names for improved organization and understanding of variable relationships throughout the design system.


User Experience

The tabbed interface provides clean separation between remapping and analysis functions, enabling focused workflows for different use cases. Real-time feedback includes loading states, progress indicators, and detailed status messages to keep users informed throughout operations.

Comprehensive error handling delivers actionable feedback when issues arise, while the modern user interface utilizes Figma-native styling with responsive design principles for seamless integration with existing workflows.


USE CASES


Design System Migration

Organizations can migrate from deprecated variable libraries to updated versions, consolidate multiple libraries into a single source of truth, and update variable references when reorganizing design systems. This capability is essential for maintaining consistency during design system evolution and reducing technical debt.


Theme Management

Teams can efficiently switch between light and dark theme variables, apply brand-specific variable sets across different product lines, and test various variable configurations during design exploration phases. This functionality supports rapid iteration and brand consistency maintenance.


Cleanup and Optimization

The plugin enables identification of unused or orphaned variable bindings, standardization of variable usage across teams, and comprehensive auditing of variable implementation across large-scale projects. These capabilities support design system hygiene and optimization efforts.


Workflow Automation

Organizations can batch update variable references during design system updates, streamline handoff processes between design and development teams, and maintain consistency across multiple Figma files. This automation reduces manual work and minimizes human error in variable management processes.
plugins.tagline: Streamline design system by bulk remapping variables across libraries, pages, and components.

Organizations can batch update variable references during design system updates, streamline handoff processes between design and development teams, and maintain consistency across multiple Figma files. This automation reduces manual work and minimizes human error in variable management processes.
136137.tagline: Streamline design system by bulk remapping variables across libraries, pages, and components.

plugins.name: Link Spacing & Radius Variables (Alpha)
plugins.description:
One-click application of variables to selected objects


Important: Variable Requirements

1. Variables must be in an external library (local variables are not supported yet)

2. The library must be connected to your file


Variable Naming Requirements:

For Spacing:

- Format: `space-{number}`

- Examples: `space-4`, `space-8`, `space-16`, `space-24`

- Variable value must match the number in the name

For Radius:

- Format: `radius-{number}`

- Examples: `radius-4`, `radius-8`, `radius-16`

- Variable value must match the number in the name


Collection Requirements:

- Spacing collection must include the word "spacing" in its name

- Radius collection must include the word "radius" or "border-radius" in its name


How to Prepare Your File

1. Connect the variable library:

- Open "Team Library" menu

- Find the required library

- Enable the toggle next to the "Variables" section

2. Ensure objects are prepared:

- For spacing: objects must use Auto Layout

- For radius: objects must support the cornerRadius property


How to Use

1. Select objects you want to apply variables to

2. Launch the plugin

3. Choose the desired collection from the dropdown (marked with 📚 icon)

4. Click "Apply spacing" or "Apply radius"
plugins.tagline: Link spacing and radius variables

127312.description:

plugins.name: Text Filler with CSV
plugins.description:
You can populate components containing multiple text elements with strings from a CSV file.

Tab-separated values are also supported, allowing copy-paste directly from Google Spreadsheet.

Rows and columns are applied in layer order, and empty cells are skipped.


複数のテキストを含むコンポーネントに CSV から文字列を流し込むことができます。

タブ区切りにも対応し、Google Spreadsheet からのコピペも対応しています。

行や列は、レイヤー順に適用され、空のセルはスキップされます。


解説記事： https://note.com/feb19/n/n17ac26f980e0
plugins.tagline: Populate components with multiple text fields from CSV automatically. 複数テキストを持つコンポーネントに文字列を自動入力できます。

plugins.name: Contrastio - Contrast & Accessibility Checker
plugins.description:
Contrastio helps you create more inclusive designs by automatically checking your work against WCAG accessibility guidelines.


🎯 Instant Accessibility Scanning

Check entire pages or specific frames with one click

Get real-time feedback on accessibility issues

Smart element exclusion with prefix system


📊 Comprehensive Checks

Color contrast validation (WCAG 2.0 & 2.1)

Typography accessibility analysis

Support for all compliance levels (A, AA, AAA)

Text readability assessment


🚀 Designer-Friendly Workflow

One-click element highlighting

Clear violation explanations

Grouped similar issues for easy fixes


⚡ Efficient & Fast

Scan thousands of elements in seconds

Stay in your design flow

No external tools needed


Why Contrastio?

Whether you're designing for government websites, enterprise applications, or simply want to create more inclusive designs, Contrastio helps ensure your work meets accessibility standards from the start.


Free Version Includes:

Up to 2,000 node scans per month


Pro Version ($4.99) Adds:

Unlimited node scanning

All new features coming along like reporting, screen/color modes.
plugins.tagline: Instant WCAG accessibility checks for your Figma designs

plugins.name: Text binder for AI
plugins.description:
Text Binder for AI

A LLM-optimized plugin that lets you enhance text content with AI while preserving your Figma designs. Built with AI guardrails, this plugin safely extracts, processes, and updates text across multiple frames without breaking layouts or losing design fidelity.


✨ Key Features

🎯 AI-Ready Content Extraction

  1. Extract text with reference tags for LLM processing
  2. Maintain exact positioning and styling information
  3. Process multiple frames simultaneously
  4. Built-in prompts and guardrails for AI safety


🔄 Validated Content Updates

  1. Preview AI-generated changes before applying
  2. Intelligent length validation for layout preservation
  3. Real-time status checks for each text element
  4. Clear warnings for potential layout impacts


🚀 Getting Started

  1. Select your target frames
  2. Extract text with AI-friendly reference tags
  3. Use any LLM while maintaining the safety tags
  4. Review changes with automatic validation
  5. Apply updates with confidence
plugins.tagline: AI-enhanced, design-protected

116310.description:

plugins.name: Layout Lab
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with automated layout perfection. This powerful plugin streamlines your design process by intelligently handling spacing, alignment, and organization – saving you valuable time while ensuring pixel-perfect results.


🎯 Key Features:

  1. Auto-Layout: Instantly structure frames and elements with intelligent automation
  2. Perfect Spacing: Apply consistent spacing between elements with a single click
  3. Smart Grouping: Organize similar frames and elements into clean, logical layouts
  4. Nested Layer Support: Apply consistent spacing across all layer depths
  5. Customizable Settings: Fine-tune spacing, gaps, and layout modes to match your needs


💪 Perfect For:

  1. UI/UX Designers creating complex interfaces
  2. Design teams maintaining consistency across projects
  3. Product designers working on component libraries
  4. Anyone looking to speed up their layout workflow


🚀 How It Works:

  1. Select the elements you want to organize
  2. Choose your preferred layout settings
  3. Let the plugin work its magic!


✨ Benefits:

  1. Save hours on manual layout adjustments
  2. Maintain consistent spacing throughout your designs
  3. Reduce time spent on repetitive tasks
  4. Create more professional, polished layouts
  5. Ensure design system compliance


🎨 Supported Features:

  1. Auto-spacing calculation
  2. Intelligent grouping
  3. Responsive layouts
  4. Multi-selection support
  5. Custom spacing presets
  6. Quick actions


Made with ❤️ by a designer for designers. We're constantly improving – your feedback helps make this plugin better for everyone!
plugins.tagline: Automate your design workflow with perfect spacing, smart grouping, and pixel-perfect layouts

  3. Let the plugin work its magic!


✨ Benefits:

  1. Save hours on manual layout adjustments
  2. Maintain consistent spacing throughout your designs
  3. Reduce time spent on repetitive tasks
  4. Create more professional, polished layouts
  5. Ensure design system compliance


🎨 Supported Features:

  1. Auto-spacing calculation
  2. Intelligent grouping
  3. Responsive layouts
  4. Multi-selection support
  5. Custom spacing presets
  6. Quick actions


Made with ❤️ by a designer for designers. We're constantly improving – your feedback helps make this plugin better for everyone!
115633.release_notes:
I'm excited to announce the latest updates to the Layout Lab Plugin! Here’s what’s new:

🚀 New Features:
Rectangles Added to Defined Node: Rectangles are now recognized as valid nodes and included in the auto-layout system.

🛠 Enhancements:
Horizontal Layout Improvements: Enhanced grouping of frames with similar Y positions (within a 3-pixel tolerance) into horizontal rows for better alignment.

📝 How to Use:
Rectangles: Select rectangles with other nodes and run the plugin.
Horizontal Layout: Select frames with similar Y positions for automatic grouping.

Thank you for using the Layout Lab Plugin! 🎨
115633.tagline: Automate your design workflow with perfect spacing, smart grouping, and pixel-perfect layouts

plugins.name: 10x HTML | Design to clean responsive code 10x faster
plugins.description:
⚡️ Instantly turn your Figma design into clean, responsive HTML / CSS / SCSS

🚀 No registration, no paywall, click and get your code

🔍 Preview / inspect the generated code in Figma

⚡️ Test responsiveness and make live adjustments

🎓 Smart layout and naming



Who is it for ?


  1. Beginner looking to turn a design into a website starting from a clean structure where 90% of the work is already handled


  1. Advanced front-end developers looking to drastically speed up their workflow without compromising on the structure and readability of their code.


No registration required - run the plugin, select a frame and preview the result in a single click.

Works in both Design mode and Dev mode.



What is 10x HTML ?


Most design-to-code tools generate bloated or messy output, with non optimized layout.

That’s because extracting logic from a visual design — especially an unstructured one — is a hard problem..


10x HTML was built from the ground up with the clear goal of solving those issues with smart rules and layout inference.


We focus on :

- Understanding layout intent

- Reducing unnecessary nesting

- Recognizing repeated patterns (even copy-pasted ones)

- Grouping elements intelligently

- and more...


10x HTML doesn't claim to replace a frontend developer — but it dramatically accelerates your workflow by giving you clean, factorized and structured code that you can build on.


Whether you're a beginner or an experienced front-end developer, 10xHTML is designed to handle most of the heavy lifting for you—making smart assumptions when needed and delivering perfect code with clear naming and structure that’s easy to build upon.


Clean, semantic code – without the mess

- Converts buttons, inputs, headers, and more into proper HTML elements

- Uses a smart class system: base classes, modifiers, and utilities based on context

- Picks optimized class names

- Flattens overly nested layers


Smart, responsive export

- Fully responsive by default — includes media and container queries

- Detects and links similar elements, even without components

- Intelligently groups and infers layout, even from unstructured designs


Live code and layout inspection

- Preview the final webpage right in Figma

- Test responsiveness

- Do live update to adjust the code

- Download the code and get ready for production


How to reach out ?

💬 Request support here

💡 Suggest an improvement here

🕷 Report a bug here

🚀 Join our Discord for support, feedback or questions..


⚠️ Note :

10x HTML is currently free and fully accessible as a Beta version.

We are trying to gather as much feedback as possible, so please feel free to post any kind of comments (bug report, idea, opinion...)

Once we reach the level of maturity we’re aiming for, we will switch to a paid model

(with very reasonable pricing)
plugins.tagline: Convert your design to high quality HTML / CSS / SCSS in one click and download your code.

plugins.name: SVG Export no Fill
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to export SVG icons from Figma without the fill attribute, making it easy to modify the icon colors later. You can upload the SVG files to platforms like Elementor or use them with CSS to easily change icon colors via the interface or stylesheets.

Ideal for developers who need reusable, customizable icons that can be easily adapted in various projects.
plugins.tagline: Export SVG icons without fill for easy CSS styling

130213.name: SVG Export no Fill
130213.description:

Ideal for developers who need reusable, customizable icons that can be easily adapted in various projects.

plugins.name: Frame Manager
plugins.description:
A simple but powerful tool for organizing and fixing frames in Figma. Detect duplicates, fix naming issues, and ensure proper dimensions in your design files.

Full Description

Frame Manager helps you maintain clean and well-organized Figma files by providing essential tools for working with frames.

Key Features:

🔍 Duplicate Frame Detection & Removal

Instantly find frames with identical names

Option to automatically remove duplicates while keeping one instance

Clean up messy files by eliminating redundant elements

🏷️ Frame Name Standardization

Identify frames with non-standard naming conventions

Automatically fix frame names to follow consistent PascalCase format

Enforce naming consistency across your design system

📏 Size Optimization

Find frames with dimensions not divisible by 2

Fix frame sizes to ensure clean rendering on various displays

Find frames with non-power-of-2 dimensions for texture optimization

How It Works

Install the plugin and run it from the Plugins menu

Select the feature you need from the simple, intuitive interface

Get instant feedback as the plugin detects issues or fixes problems

Enjoy a cleaner, more organized Figma file

Perfect For

Design teams working on large files

Designers preparing assets for developers

Anyone who wants to maintain consistent naming and sizing in their designs

Technical Details

Lightweight and fast - analyzes your file without lag

Non-destructive - always gives you control over changes

Works with any Figma file containing frames

Maintain better design hygiene and save hours of manual cleanup with Frame Manager!


2025 - WildCard Studios - Art Department
plugins.tagline: Clean & organize frames: find duplicates, fix names, proper dimensions with one-click solutions.

plugins.name: flowwwww
plugins.description:
Streamline your workflows with flowwwww, the ultimate plugin for creating dynamic connectors between frames, components, and other objects in Figma. Whether you're designing user flows, wireframes, or complex diagrams, flowwwwwempowers you to create professional, customizable connections with ease.


Key Features

Intuitive Connector Creation

Select two frames or components, and flowwwww will instantly generate a connector between them.


Highly Customizable

Personalize your connectors with adjustable properties:

Stroke color and size.

Add text annotations to label your connectors for enhanced clarity.


Smart Obstacle Avoidance

Enable Obstacle Mode to automatically detect and avoid overlapping objects, ensuring clean and unobstructed connectors.

Perfect for complex designs where connectors need to navigate around other elements.



Use Cases

User Flows : Map out user journeys with clear, annotated connectors between screens.

Wireframing : Create structured layouts with precise connections between components.

Technical Diagrams : Build flowcharts, process maps, and other technical illustrations with ease.

Prototyping : Enhance your prototypes with interactive and visually appealing connectors.


How It Works

Install the flowwwww plugin from the Figma Community.

Select two frames, components, or rectangles that you want to connect.


Configure your connector settings (color, style, etc.) via the plugin interface.


Let flowwwww do the rest—watch as it creates beautiful, dynamic connectors that adapt to your design.


Why Choose flowwwww?

flowwwww is more than just a connector tool—it’s a productivity booster for designers who value precision, flexibility, and efficiency. With its robust feature set and seamless integration into Figma, flowwwww is the go-to solution for anyone looking to elevate their design workflow.


Feedback and Support

We’re committed to making flowwwww the best it can be! If you have any suggestions, encounter issues, or simply love the plugin, we’d love to hear from you. Leave a comment on the Figma Community page or reach out to us directly.


Get Started Today

Install flowwwww now and experience the power of effortless connector creation. Simplify your design process and bring your ideas to life with clarity and precision.
plugins.tagline: Effortless Connector Creation for Figma

plugins.name: Design Feedback Lite
plugins.description: Instantly review selected frames using core UX principles. Get structured feedback, radar scoring, and real-time insights — all powered by design psychology.
plugins.tagline: Instant UX feedback on your designs — backed by psychology.

126473.name: Design Feedback Lite
126473.description: Instantly review selected frames using core UX principles. Get structured feedback, radar scoring, and real-time insights — all powered by design psychology.
126473.release_notes:
✨ Viewport-aware analysis: Mobile and desktop designs now get context-appropriate feedback.

⚠️ Contrast issues now tiered: Low, medium, and high severity for better prioritization.

💡 Smart Mode improved: Skips system layers like status bars, navs, and menu bars.

🧠 Accessibility standard toggle: Choose between WCAG 2.1 AA and AAA.

🎯 Refined touch and text size rules: Based on device context and layer type.

🎨 Sleek new UI: Modern layout, grouped controls, and better legibility.

Small plugin. Big feedback. Smarter than ever.
126473.tagline: Instant UX feedback on your designs — backed by psychology.
